projects_promo.heading: Projects
projects_promo.body: I believe the best way to learn is by building and sharing. Here I show you some of the projects I've worked on, applying technology, design, and lots of creativity. Check them out!

projects.heading: Projects
projects.intro: I turn ideas into reality through code, creativity, and a lot of beautiful mistakes. Each project here tells the story of learning something new and figuring things out, one step at a time.

jobs.title: Travel Insurance & Assistance
jobs.description: Provided emergency medical assistance and coordination for travelers, managing and processing insurance claims.

jobs.title: Cargo Transport Insurance
jobs.description: Progressed through senior management roles, handling complex international claims and managing a global network of surveyors.

jobs.title: Professional MMA Judge & Instructor
jobs.description: Officiated for premier MMA promotions across Eurasia and trained the next generation of judges.

jobs.title: Customer Service & Supervision
jobs.description: Built a foundational career in customer relations, advancing to a supervisor role to resolve escalated complaints.
